# Formula: Correlation

> **Skill ID:** `prism-formula-f-stat-004`
> **Category:** FORMULA
> **Version:** 2.0.0 (Real Content)

## Description

Correlation. Equation: r = Σ(x-x̄)(y-ȳ) / √(Σ(x-x̄)²×Σ(y-ȳ)²)
